official_title: A bill to authorize any bank holding company to acquire control of banks located throughout the standard metropolitan statistical area in which such bank holding company is located.

summary.text: Amends the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to permit a bank holding company to acquire banks throughout the standard metropolitan statistical area (SMSA) in which its operations were conducted as of July 1, 1956, or the date it became a bank holding company, whichever is later, including a SMSA in other States.

titles.title: A bill to authorize any bank holding company to acquire control of banks located throughout the standard metropolitan statistical area in which such bank holding company is located.
